revised_title: Crustacea Observed During the Cruise of H.M.S. Challenger in the Southern Sea
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
tldr: The author describes their observations and findings of various crustaceans during the cruise of H.M.S. Challenger in the Southern Sea. They discuss the different species of crustaceans found at various depths and locations, including the Antarctic region. The author also highlights the discovery of a large ostracod and a gigantic amphipod in the deep sea, emphasizing the size variations of these creatures compared to their shallow-water counterparts.
